doc.title: Zhestok romans za Galya M.
doc.plot: A business lady, running her own company, is sentenced to two-year and a half imprisonment. After being released, she faces her real problems -she is homeless and spends the nights together with the clochards at the Central Railway Station. Nevertheless, she seeks after the truth and justice. This is a documentary confession about the spiritual catharsis this woman experienced on the way to repentance.
